# linear_workspace (Data Source)

Linear workspace.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "linear_workspace" "org" {}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier of the workspace.

- `url_key` (String) URL key of the workspace.
